name: Umbrel v0.5.0
notes:
If your Umbrel becomes unreachable after the update, please try re-flashing Umbrel OS 0.5 on your Raspberry Piâ€™s microSD card. In case you face any other issues while updating, please message us on Telegram: https://t.me/getumbrel

Introducing Umbrel 0.5. A whole new look. Realtime app updates. App permissions, dependencies, and authentication. Official Bitcoin & Lightning node apps. Oh, and dark mode.

Our biggest update to Umbrel yet. Read the full announcement: link.umbrel.com/surprise
